serverInfo.name: EzBiz Social Media Analytics
serverInfo.description: AI-powered social media analytics via MCP. Profile analysis, engagement scoring, trend detection, and hashtag research across major platforms.

tools.name: analyze_profile
tools.description: Analyze a social media profile or brand presence — posting patterns, content themes, audience indicators, and growth recommendations.

tools.name: score_engagement
tools.description: Score social media engagement for a brand or topic — engagement rate estimates, content effectiveness, posting time analysis, and benchmarks.

tools.name: detect_trends
tools.description: Detect trending topics and conversations in a niche — viral content patterns, emerging topics, sentiment shifts, and opportunity alerts.

tools.name: research_hashtags
tools.description: Research effective hashtags for a topic — popularity estimates, related hashtags, niche classification, and recommended hashtag sets.
